short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: brüno is a video recording and messaging application with quick sharing features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An application that records your screen while you talk, and shares it instantly among your friends, family and peers. In essence, it captures everything that you do on screen with the capability to record your camera, microphone and the screen you wish to share. It also has a capability to take a snapshot of any part of your screen.

It is one of the fastest growing tools to easily capture your screen and do online collaboration, whether personal among your family and friends, among your colleagues at work, or among your clients and customers. Its very intuitive and user-friendly features can be used by anyone.

KEY FEATURES
* Record your screen, camera, microphone
* Automatically saves videos and screenshot over the cloud for easy access anywhere you are and instant sharing features
* Everyone can be notified for any action made like comments, views, shares
* Video and screenshot editing and annotation function
